availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William R. Hydes (Louisville City Marshal, Deputy Sheriff, and builder/contractor)

body.p: Born and resided in Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky. A builder and contractor. Served as Deputy Sheriff of Jefferson County for 16 years. Also a City Marshal of Louisville.

bibl.p: "Born in a Log Cabin. Funeral of William R. Hydes Yesterday Afternoon. A Louisvillian For Seventy-Six Years. A Local Landmark," Louisville Courier-Journal, 24 Apr 1895, 6, ProQuest Historical Newspapers.
